inclusion.criterion: Infiltrating, ductal carcinoma of the breast.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Treated with conservative surgery (tumorectomy or quadrantectomy) without lymphadenectomy.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Sentinel lymph node assessed by OSNA, with TTL in the range 250 - 15,000 copies/μL.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Other types of breast cancer different from infiltrating ductal carcinoma.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Mastectomy or axillary homolateral lymph node dissection.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Systemic neoadjuvant therapy previous to surgery.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Contraindications of radiotherapy (pregnancy, severe collagen diseases).
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 45-year-old postmenopausal woman with cytologically confirmed breast cancer. Candidate for tumor resection and agrees to do so prior to chemotherapy.
